Package Controllers

Class CustomerForm

java.lang.Object
Controllers.Helper
Controllers.CustomerForm
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class CustomerForm extends Helper implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This contains all the methods that control the behaviour of the customers form. Adding and editing customers.

    • handleWeekRadio

      public void handleWeekRadio() throws SQLException
      LAMBDA EXPRESSION: Converts start time stamp to a local date time and checks if the appointment is in the selected month. Get appointments in the current month. Populated the appointment table with appointments occurring on the selected week.

      SQLException
